question: Which Union Ministry launched the real-time monitoring system of toll plazas at national highways across the country?
option1: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
option3: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
answer: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
explanation:
The Ministry of Road Transport and Highways launched the real-time monitoring system of toll plazas at national highways across the country. It will be used to measure the Daily Congestion Index for each plaza and overall congestion across national highway network in real time.
It will also collect real time data on high peak hoursâ€™ traffic. The purpose is to reduce congestion and improve efficiency of FASTag usage.
